actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Forest, Family Farms, and Energy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests, Family Farms, and Energy

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to release a reversionary interest held by the United States in certain lands located in Sumter County, South Carolina.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to release a reversionary interest in specified land in the Manchester State Forest, Sumter County, South Carolina, to the South Carolina State Commission of Forestry.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to release a reversionary interest held by the United States in certain lands located in Sumter County, South Carolina.
